description: The Contract requires non-electrical fitness equipment including delivery, offloading, installation and set up at the RCMP T Division Police Fitness centre, Regina, Sask.",
full_summary:
=====================================

**Request for Proposal for Non-Electrical Fitness Equipment**
===========================================================

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is issuing a request for proposal for the supply of non-electrical fitness equipment, including delivery, offloading, installation, and setup at the RCMP T Division Police Fitness Centre in Regina, Saskatchewan.

**Tender Details**
-----------------

* Tender Reference Number: cb-197-53132337
* Solicitation Number: M5000-24-1070/A
* Tender Closing Date: October 12, 2023, 4:00 PM CST
* Expected Contract Start Date: December 15, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: December 22, 2023

**Procurement Method**
---------------------

This is an open tender, however, it will be conditionally set-aside under the Government of Canada's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) if two or more bids are received from Indigenous businesses certified under the PSIB criteria and listed in the Government of Canada's Indigenous Business Directory.

**Selection Criteria**
---------------------

The lowest price compliant bidder will be recommended for award.

**Submission Guidelines**
----------------------

Tenders must be submitted electronically to nwr_procurement_bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca by the closing date and time mentioned above. Refer to the attached tender documents for complete submission guidelines and requirements.

**Important Notice**
-------------------

The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. As a result, integrity provisions are being applied in RCMP contracting activities as outlined in this solicitation.

**Indigenous Procurement**
-------------------------

Having a business profile in the Indigenous Business Directory can increase your company's visibility and provide additional business opportunities. A profile in the directory can also allow you to compete for federal government contracts that are set-aside for Indigenous businesses through the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses. For more information and to register, visit: <https://www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory>

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For more information, please contact Shailesh Rajgor at shaileshkumar.rajgor@rcmp-grc.gc.ca or (780) 670-8554.

**Attachments**
----------------

The following documents are attached to this tender notice:

* RFP - AMED-03 - English - French
* RFP - AMED-01 - English - French
* RFP - AMED-02 - English - French
* RFP - English - M500
